about_the_game:
THE NEW OLD

Battle for Vera is a Real-Time Strategy game that draws inspiration from beloved classics, and improves upon many of their ideas to create an exciting new experience. Veterans of the genre should feel right at home, while newcomers will enjoy a more focused approach and the addition of many quality-of-life features.

BATTLE RAGES OVER VERA

Three distinct factions are fighting over the rich resources of this desert planet. Terra Prima, a conglomerate of Earth's corporate entities set out to find new profitable ventures. Their mercenary military is prepared for all situations, and should they falter - Terra Prima maintains air supremacy over the battlefield. Crimson Empire are mighty tyrants in pursuit of complete domination over all of known cosmos. Their heavy units strike fear into the hearts of their enemies. The enigmatic BioNexus will stop at nothing to enforce their agenda. They deploy highly specialized infantry, light vehicles and aren't afraid of sacrifice.

MAIN FEATURES

  • Retro Pixel-Art graphics
  • 3 unique factions
  • 3 campaigns with 10 missions each
  • Carefully designed levels with ruthless AI opponents that play fair and square
  • Voiced unit responses and acknowledgements
  • Energetic soundtrack

DEMO

Demo contains first 3 missions from Terra Prima campaing.

STORY

Planet Vera.
Discovered in 2655 A.D.
Only source of Veritium, a rare liquid substance, coveted for its energy properties.
This discovery ignited a new era of interstellar conflict.
Powerful factions vied for control, triggering a battle for supremacy.
Your choices will shape the destiny of Vera and its most precious resource.
